title: Group portrait of guests of Min-Ceil Club, seated from left: Mrs. Jackson, Mrs. T. C. Ervin, Mrs. Thomas Bolden, Mrs. Earl Simms, Mrs. Herbert U. White, Mrs. M. R. Hadley, and Mrs. Alvin P. Lee; standing: Mrs. John K. Wood, Mrs. Wesley I. Howell, Jean Bolden Farrish, Dr. M. W. Hadley, Mrs. Joseph Price, Mrs. Emmett Davis, Dr. Earl S. Sims, and Mrs. Helen Robinson, gathered for gala annual breakfast, home of Mr. and Mrs. Emmett Davis, Lincoln Avenue
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
